children.comment: That and I managed to thieve MREs constantly, those things are calorie bombs.

children.author: hlyshft
mwmurray
hlyshft
mwmurray
hlyshft
children.comment: I've in-processed 3-34 twice now (my late shippers and the next cycle) and I always find the Dragons and Eagles the quickest.. fuck Outlaws
Delta of course... but those dam MRE's I still can't eat the cheese out of those things.  Now I just get charged for them and never eat em.
Which 3-34, though? Delta, Echo (Eagles!) and Foxtrot were on the hill in the trailers, hence the shitty DFAC. A-C co had the nice one.
What? I was in 3-34 We got steak, fish, Chicken cordon fuckin Bleu.  Not everyday but it was better than the other DFAC's I've been too. :-0
We were in the ghetto, 3-34, so we had the ghetto DFAC. I didn't much like the food, but they basically forced us to gorge ourselves. Ugh.
I could see that the DFAC I went to at Jackson was one of the best.  I loaded up like a fat kid.  Although, I couldnt eat eggs afterwards.
I gained almost 40 lbs from all the crap they were feeding us. I went right back to slovenly ways in AIT and promptly shed 25lbs.
Dudes definitely lost some water weight at Jackson during BCT.  I think I literally sweated buckets worth of liquids.

data.comment: Ahhhh good ol' SamHou... I had a guy at my BCT in Jackson like you. He's doing great now. Stay on it, Battle. :)

children.comment: You can quit at basic and get out or quit out of certain schools, although that will normally mess up your military career.
You can quit?  Wat.  I've honestly never seen anyone just quit.
Yeah, I've seen people quit at very odd times, even when things seemed to be going their way.
It boggled my mind how many people just cracked in AIT. I would have thought they'd have figured out in BCT that it wasn't for them.
Hah, very true. The army has been great for me but its not for everyone.
